div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 10, 1895. NEW DRAMATIC SOCIETY ORGANIZED AT ST. HEDWIG PARISH

body.p: (The following news item was received for publication in the Dziennik Chicagoski.)
Through the efforts of the Reverend John Piechowski, pastor, the Dramatic Circle of St. Hedwig Parish was organized recently.

At the initial meeting the following were elected to office: Anthony Zagrzebski, president; Peter Lama, vice-president; Frank Lipski, recording secretary; Joseph Rogalski, financial secretary; Francis Lorentz, treasurer; F. Piszczek, marshal; J. Kubera, in charge of wardrobe.
Information and letters should be sent to the secretary:
